Variable Documentation

W FGraph
 

FGraph Constructor.

This is the Wednus control wrap of the Force Directed Graphs in Javascript by Kyle Scholz.

Parameters:
hideFirst true to hide graph first. otherwise, false.
wps WPS data
Examples:
1_bigger_nodes.html, 2_snow.html, 3_text_on_origin.html, 4_text_nodes.html, 5_hide.html, CodeExample.html, example1.html, example2.html, and FGraph.html.

W FGraph prototype getNode

 function(id){

}

Definition at line 79 of file FGraph.js.

W FGraph prototype addNode
 

Initial value:

 function(text, mass, fromOrig, edgeWeight, background, border){
    var node = this.control.addNode(text, mass?mass:2, fromOrig?fromOrig:true, edgeWeight);
    if(color && this.getNode( node.id ).style)
        this.getNode( node.id ).style.background = background?background:'';
    if(border && this.getNode( node.id ).style)
        this.getNode( node.id ).style.border = border?border:'';
    return node;
}
Add node.

This method adds a node into graph.

Parameters:
text text to be placed on node
mass mass of node
fromOrig true if it's connected to the origin, otherwise, false
edgeWeight weight of edge
background (optional) node background (CSS)
border (optional) node border (CSS)

Definition at line 95 of file FGraph.js.

W FGraph prototype addEdge
 

Initial value:

 function(from, to, weight){
    this.control.addEdge(from, to, weight);
}
Add edge.

This method adds an edge.

Parameters:
from source node
to destination
weight weight of edge

Definition at line 113 of file FGraph.js.

W FGraph prototype setOrigin
 

Initial value:

 function(html){
    this.origin.appendChild(document.createTextNode(html));
}
Set origin text.

This method places text(html) on the origin.

Parameters:
html caption (HTML)
Test:
3_text_on_origin.html
